description: An empty widget that can contain other widgets.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

padding.description: Additional space to add inside the widget's bounds. If set to a number, this padding will be applied on all four sides.

append.description: Adds the given widgets to the composite.
Adds all widgets in the given array to the composite.
Adds all widgets in the given collection to the composite.

addChild.description: Fired when a child is added to this widget.

child.description: The widget that is added as a child.

index.description: Denotes the position in the children list at which the child widget is added.

removeChild.description: Fired when a child is removed from this widget.

index.description: The property `index` denotes the removed child widget's position in the children list.`
